original_text: The Lord's message to you was, “Turn away from your wicked way of life. Stop doing the evil things that you are doing. If you do that, you may continue to live in this land. It is the land that the Lord gave to you and to your ancestors to be their home for ever.
korean_text: 그가 이르시기를 너희는 각자의 악한 길과 악행을 버리고 돌아오라 그리하면 나 여호와가 너희와 너희 조상들에게 영원부터 영원까지 준 그 땅에 살리라

sentences.original_text: The Lord's message to you was
sentences.korean_translation: 당신에게 주신 주님의 메시지는 다음과 같았습니다

sentences.original_text: Turn away from your wicked way of life
Stop doing the evil things that you are doing
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 하고 있는 악한 행동들을 멈추십시오

sentences.original_text: you may continue to live in this land
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 이 땅에서 계속 살 수 있을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: It is the land that the Lord gave to you
and to your ancestors to be their home for ever
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신의 조상들에게 영원한 집이 되도록 주신 땅입니다
